title: Avatar: The Last Airbender

awardEventDetails.title: 2007 Nominee Primetime Emmy
awardEventDetails.for: Outstanding Animated Program (For Programming Less Than One Hour)
awardEventDetails.description: Michael Dante DiMartino (executive producer) - Bryan Konietzko (executive producer) - Eric Coleman (executive producer) - Aaron Ehasz (co-executive producer/head writer) - Tim Hedrick (written by) - Lauren MacMullan (directed by) - Jae-Myung Yoo (animation director/timing director) (For City of Walls and Secrets (2006))

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Annie
awardEventDetails.for: Best Animated Television Production Produced for Children

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Winner Annie
awardEventDetails.for: Best Directing in an Animated Television Production or Short Form
awardEventDetails.description: Joaquim Dos Santos (For episode "Sozin's Comet: Part 3 - Into the Inferno".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2007 Winner Annie
awardEventDetails.for: Best Character Animation in a Television Production

awardEventDetails.title: 2007 Winner Annie
awardEventDetails.for: Best Directing in an Animated Television Production

awardEventDetails.title: 2009 Nominee Golden Reel Award
awardEventDetails.description: Ben Wynn (supervising sound editor/sound designer) - Mishelle Fordham (supervising dialogue editor) - Jason Stiff (supervising adr editor) - Aran Tanchum (supervising foley editor) - Jeremy Zuckerman (music editor) - Sergio Silva (foley editor) - Paulette Victor-Lifton (foley editor) - Chris Gresham (foley editor) - Matthew Thomas Hall (foley editor) - Vincent Guisetti (foley artist) (Episode: "Sozin's Comet Part 4: Avatar Aang")

awardsHtml:
9 wins & 6 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2007 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Animated Program (For Programming Less Than One Hour)
Michael Dante DiMartino (executive producer) - Bryan Konietzko (executive producer) - Eric Coleman (executive producer) - Aaron Ehasz (co-executive producer/head writer) - Tim Hedrick (written by) - Lauren MacMullan (directed by) - Jae-Myung Yoo (animation director/timing director) (For City of Walls and Secrets (2006))
2007 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Individual Achievement in Animation
Sangjin Kim (animator) (For episode "Lake Laogai".)

Annie Awards

2009 Winner Annie
Best Animated Television Production Produced for Children
2009 Winner Annie
Best Directing in an Animated Television Production or Short Form
Joaquim Dos Santos (For episode "Sozin's Comet: Part 3 - Into the Inferno".)
2007 Winner Annie
Best Character Animation in a Television Production
Jae-Myung Yoo (For episode "The Blind Bandit".)
2007 Winner Annie
Best Directing in an Animated Television Production
Giancarlo Volpe (For episode "The Drill".)
2006 Nominee Annie
Best Animated Television Production

Motion Picture Sound Editors, USA

2009 Nominee Golden Reel Award
Best Sound Editing - Television Animation
Ben Wynn (supervising sound editor/sound designer) - Mishelle Fordham (supervising dialogue editor) - Jason Stiff (supervising adr editor) - Aran Tanchum (supervising foley editor) - Jeremy Zuckerman (music editor) - Sergio Silva (foley editor) - Paulette Victor-Lifton (foley editor) - Chris Gresham (foley editor) - Matthew Thomas Hall (foley editor) - Vincent Guisetti (foley artist) (Episode: "Sozin's Comet Part 4: Avatar Aang")

Peabody Awards

2009 Winner Peabody Award
Winner

Kids' Choice Awards, USA

2008 Winner Blimp Award
Favorite Cartoon

Satellite Awards

2008 Nominee Satellite Award
Best Youth DVD
(Book 3 Fire, Vol. 4)

Gold Derby Awards

2008 Nominee Gold Derby TV Award
Animated Series

Genesis Awards

2007 Winner Genesis Award
Outstanding Children's Programming
(For episode "Appa's Lost Days")
